Syntax Highlighting

(function() {
  function hanoi(n, a, b, c) {
    return n ? hanoi(n - 1, a, c, b)
        .concat([[a, b]])
        .concat(hanoi(n - 1, c, b, a)) : [];
  }
  return hanoi(3, 'left', 'right', 'mid')
    .map(function(d) {
      return d[0] + ' -> ' + d[1];
    });
})();

  • Edit Stylus styles in src/styles/user.styl
  • Edit JavaScript in src/scripts/main.js
